title: Harold and Maude Original Soundtrack (MP3/192)
description:
Harold and Maude Original Soundtrack - All nine songs used in the movie "Harold and Maude".

Harold and Maude Soundtrack
Songs by Cat Stevens

An official soundtrack containing all of the Cat Stevens songs used in the movie Harold & Maude has never been released on CD. Taken from three Cat Stevens albums - Tea for the Tillerman, Mona Bone Jakon and Footsteps in the Dark (Greatest Hits, Vol. 2).

Two songs, "Don&#039;t Be Shy" and "If You Want to Sing Out, Sing Out," were written specifically for the movie and were not released in any form until 1984 on Footsteps in the Dark/Greatest Hits Volume Two. 

The list below is in the order that the songs appear in the film... 

Don&#039;t Be Shy
On The Road To Find Out
I Wish, I Wish
Miles from Nowhere
Tea for the Tillerman
I Think I See the Light
Where Do the Children Play?
If You Want to Sing Out, Sing Out
Trouble
